description: Meta Info that is used in the Nomad Repository

metaInfos.description: First name of a author of NOMAD repository data (includes middle names)
metaInfos.name: author_first_name

metaInfos.description: Last name of a author to NOMAD repository data
metaInfos.name: author_last_name

metaInfos.description: Name (fista and last name) of an author of NOMAD repository data
metaInfos.name: author_name

metaInfos.description: Identifier of the author used in the repository
metaInfos.name: author_repo_id

metaInfos.description: internal ID of the citation (primary key in Postgres DB)
metaInfos.name: citation_repo_id

metaInfos.description: String defining the citation
metaInfos.name: citation_value

metaInfos.description: internal ID of the data set (primary key in Postgres DB calculations table)
metaInfos.name: dataset_calc_id

metaInfos.description: the NOMAD DOIs assigned to the dataset
metaInfos.name: section_dataset_doi

metaInfos.description: the internal ID assigned to a NOMAD DOI (primary key in Postgres DB)
metaInfos.name: dataset_doi_id

metaInfos.description: the name of the DOI
metaInfos.name: dataset_doi_name

metaInfos.description: Checksum idendifying the dataset in the repository
metaInfos.name: dataset_checksum

metaInfos.description: Name of NOMAD repository dataset
metaInfos.name: dataset_name

metaInfos.description: internal ID of the (optional) parent data set (primary key in Postgres DB calculations table)
metaInfos.name: dataset_parent_calc_id

metaInfos.description: Unique identifier of the parent NOMAD repository dataset
metaInfos.name: dataset_parent_pid

metaInfos.description: Unique identifier of a NOMAD repository dataset
metaInfos.name: dataset_pid

metaInfos.description: kind of access this data has currently
metaInfos.name: repository_access_now

metaInfos.description: Gid of a raw data archives that contains this calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_archive_gid

metaInfos.description: Atomic elements used in this calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_atomic_elements

metaInfos.description: String identifying the type of basis set used in this calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_basis_set_type

metaInfos.description: calc_id, an internal identifier in the database of a file/calculation in NOMAD repository
metaInfos.name: repository_calc_id

metaInfos.description: checksum of the calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_checksum

metaInfos.description: Chemical formula (composition) calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_chemical_formula

metaInfos.description: version of the code that was used to generate the calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_code_version

metaInfos.description: Comment on data uploaded to NOMAD repository
metaInfos.name: repository_comment

metaInfos.description: String identifying the crystal system of this calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_crystal_system

metaInfos.description: paths to the files associated with this calculation on the file system
metaInfos.name: repository_filepaths

metaInfos.description: Checksum of the fields used in the NOMAD repository search result table: repository_chemical_formula, repository_spacegroup_nr, repository_basis_set_type, repository_xc_treatment, repository_code_version, repository_access_now, citation_repo_id, repository_comment, author_repository_id. Checksum is Base64 (url safe) encoding of the first 168 bit of SHA-512 prefixed with 'g'
metaInfos.name: repository_grouping_checksum

metaInfos.description: Db identifier for a file/calculation in NOMAD repository
metaInfos.name: repository_id

metaInfos.description: path to the primary file of this calculation on the file system
metaInfos.name: repository_location

metaInfos.description: A nomad uri to normalized calculation corresponding to this calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_nomad_uri

metaInfos.description: Date this calculation did become, or will become open access
metaInfos.name: repository_open_date

metaInfos.description: String identifying the parser used to parse the information for the repository
metaInfos.name: repository_parser_id

metaInfos.description: Permanent identifier of a file/calculation in NOMAD repository
metaInfos.name: repository_calc_pid

metaInfos.description: String identifying the program used to generate this calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_program_name

metaInfos.description: space group of the geometry of this calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_spacegroup_nr

metaInfos.description: String identifying the type of system of this calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_system_type

metaInfos.description: URI referring to the parsed file in the original upload to repository (equivalent of mainFileUri before repackaging)
metaInfos.name: repository_uri

metaInfos.description: String identifying the xc treatment used in this calculation
metaInfos.name: repository_xc_treatment

metaInfos.description: Information about the authors of data uploaded to NOMAD repository
metaInfos.name: section_author_info

metaInfos.description: Section describing a citation
metaInfos.name: section_citation

metaInfos.description: Information on a raw data archive that contain open access data of this upload
metaInfos.name: section_raw_data

metaInfos.description: Base path of the raw data in the upload, these directories are *not* created in the archive
metaInfos.name: raw_data_base_path

metaInfos.description: paths stored in the archive, all subfiles are stored along with these
metaInfos.name: raw_data_content_roots

metaInfos.description: When the raw data archive was created
metaInfos.name: raw_data_creation_date

metaInfos.description: Unique identifier of the raw data archive
metaInfos.name: raw_data_gid

metaInfos.description: NOMAD repository dataset tagging info
metaInfos.name: section_repository_dataset

metaInfos.description: Section containing information about the original upload to NOMAD repository
metaInfos.name: section_repository_info

metaInfos.description: Information about the person with whom this calculation is shared with
metaInfos.name: section_shared_with

metaInfos.description: Information about the person who uploaded the data to NOMAD repository
metaInfos.name: section_uploader_info

metaInfos.description: data about the calculation which can be modified by the owner
metaInfos.name: section_repository_userdata

metaInfos.description: data about the calculation which can be modified by parsers
metaInfos.name: section_repository_parserdata

metaInfos.description: First name of someone this calculation is shared with
metaInfos.name: shared_with_first_name

metaInfos.description: Last name of the uploader to NOMAD repository
metaInfos.name: shared_with_last_name

metaInfos.description: full name of the user the calculation has been shared with
metaInfos.name: shared_with_name

metaInfos.description: repository-internal ID of the user the calculation has been shared with
metaInfos.name: shared_with_repo_id

metaInfos.description: username of a person this calculation is shared with
metaInfos.name: shared_with_username

metaInfos.description: Date/time when the data was uploaded to NOMAD repository (offset from *Unix epoch* (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds)
metaInfos.name: upload_date

metaInfos.description: Unique ID of the upload 'block' (upload could have been split into many archives)
metaInfos.name: upload_id

metaInfos.description: identifier for an upload
metaInfos.name: upload_repository_pid

metaInfos.description: First name of the uploader to NOMAD repository (includes middle names)
metaInfos.name: uploader_first_name

metaInfos.description: Last name of the uploader to NOMAD repository
metaInfos.name: uploader_last_name

metaInfos.description: full name of the user who uploaded the calculation
metaInfos.name: uploader_name

metaInfos.description: First name of the uploader to NOMAD repository (includes middle names)
metaInfos.name: uploader_repo_id

metaInfos.description: username of the uploader
metaInfos.name: uploader_username
